snippet.title: Portal: Revolution - Trailer
snippet.description:
Portal: Revolution is a free to play mod for Portal 2. This fully featured original campaign plays before Portal 2 in the dead and decaying Enrichment Center.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/601360/Portal_Revolution/
Game Website: https://www.portalrevolution.com
Portal: Revolution Discord: https://discord.gg/zrSVsM7

We're a small team of passionate volunteers who created this game in our spare time.

Core Team:
Stefan Heinz
Rory Lambert
Dustin Oakley
Tristan Snartt

Music:
Jared Poolaw

Voices:
Will Neal
Sarah Jacklin https://instagram.com/sezjacklinvo

----

Portal: Revolution uses a modified version of the Strata Source Engine branch of the Source Engine. Find more about it here: https://stratasource.org/
